Grammar:           DataElement 6.0
Namespace:         shr.base
Uses:              shr.core

Group:             Entry
Property:          ShrId 1..1
Property:          EntryId 1..1
Property:          EntryType 1..1
Property:          CreationTime 1..1
Property:          LastUpdated 1..1

Element:           ShrId
Value:             id

Element:           EntryId
Value:             id

Element:           EntryType
Value:             uri

Element:           LastUpdated
Value:             instant
